info.name: Kongregate Improved 2018
info.description: Changes to the behavior of the profile bar (will follow you down the page) and alternative styling for the Kongregate forums with visual improvements.
info.additionalInfo:
Jan. 10th, 2018 Release
-------------------------------------------
CHANGES
-------------------------------------------
Adjusted padding and margin for topic rows and certain action buttons (i.e. Reply to topic)
Changed blockquotes styling to blue color scheme
Changed "Quote Post" styling to match blockquotes

Jan. 9th, 2018 Release
-------------------------------------------
CHANGES
-------------------------------------------
• Adjusted margin for Profile Bar (is now further left than previously), per user feedback
• Original poster indication color gradient changed from green to blue, per user feedback
• Changed "Posted on" text before posted date to "Posted"
• Adjusted margin for flagged content and indicators on forum posts

-------------------------------------------
BUG FIXES
-------------------------------------------
• Fixed issue with topic rows not being properly indicated on both the "My Kong" page and Forums.


Jan. 8th, 2018 Release
-------------------------------------------
BUG FIXES
-------------------------------------------
• Fixed small styling errors with dropdown menus

-------------------------------------------
NEW ADDITIONS
-------------------------------------------
• New forum styling and design (specifically for forum posts)
• Forum poster details (avatar and posts) now listed horizontally instead of vetically
• Redesigned action buttons (edit, quote, flag posts), moderation tools compatible
• Original poster indication (green background gradient)
• Other styling changes and layout restructures on the forum posts
